array.name: challenge1
array.item: Try jogging to get your fitness back up

array.name: challenge2
array.item: Do some yoga to increase fitness/wellbeing and flexibility

array.name: challenge3
array.item: Meditate to calm and center yourself

array.name: challenge4
array.item: Make a meal personally to enjoy the fruits of you labor

array.name: challenge5
array.item: Talk to someone - find out what\'s happening with them

array.name: challenge6
array.item: Catch up on your favourite show - or find a new one

array.name: challenge7
array.item: Catch up on your favourite book - or find a new one

array.name: challenge8
array.item: Be adventurous - try some food you\'ve never thought about before

array.name: challenge9
array.item: Talk to someone you don\'t/can\'t see very often

array.name: challenge10
array.item: Invite people over to have a little get together

array.name: challenge12
array.item: Catch up on those jobs you just can\'t get around to doing

array.name: challenge13
array.item: Try switching styles - you never know what might be in fashion

array.name: challenge14
array.item: Catch up on your favourite band - or find a new one

array.name: challenge15
array.item: Play your favourite game - or find a new one
